definition: a Yuan dynasty form of musical comedy
mixed/miscellaneous/various/to mix
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
Four Great Yuan Dramatists, namely: Guan Hanqing 關漢卿|关汉卿[Guan1 Han4 qing1], Zheng Guangzu 鄭光祖|郑光祖[Zheng4 Guang1 zu3], Ma Zhiyuan 馬致遠|马致远[Ma3 Zhi4 yuan3] and Bai Pu 白樸|白朴[Bai2 Pu3]

sentences.english: The love-drama about talented scholars and beautiful girls is main form of the Yuan opera.
sentences.chinese: 才子佳人愛情戲是元雜劇愛情戲的主要形式。

sentences.english: Among them, the evolving of North-song Zaju is a typical case.
sentences.chinese: 其中北宋雜劇的演變最具有典型意義。

sentences.english: Third one is analysis of the theatrical productions of One-satirize act opera.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，明代中後期單折諷刺雜劇作品研究。

sentences.english: Guan Hanqing is one of the great dramatists in our country in the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 關漢卿是中國元代著名的雜劇作家之一。

sentences.english: The times of Kublai Khan was the mature and flourishing period of Kublai Khan Yuan Zaju.
sentences.chinese: 忽必烈時代是元雜劇成熟並繁盛的時期。

sentences.english: First one is analysis of One-satirize act opera's formation reason.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，明代中後期單折諷刺雜劇成因探析。

sentences.english: Immortal-taoism opera is important in Zaju of the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 神仙道化劇乃元雜劇中的一個重要門類。

sentences.english: Chapter three expound businessman image-building, including three sections;
sentences.chinese: 第三章分析元雜劇中的商人形象。

sentences.english: The reason of Buddhism play produced in Yuan Dynasty is that there is a crack in Yuan Dynasty laws.
sentences.chinese: 元雜劇中的佛教劇的產生，與元代法律存在漏洞有關。

sentences.english: Zaju embodies a firm belief on vengeance under background of traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 元雜劇體現了傳統文化背景下頑強的復仇理念。

sentences.english: There were only a few records on Zhuyeqing liquor in Yuan Dynasty (only appeared in poetic drama).
sentences.chinese: 元代關於竹葉青的記載不多，僅出現在雜劇中。

sentences.english: Snow in the summer is a famous Zajufrom the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《竇娥冤》是一部著名的元雜劇。

sentences.english: It was also a setup which taking on playing Zaju in palace.
sentences.chinese: 金教坊仍是宮廷雜劇演出的承應機構。

sentences.english: As a master of Kunqu opera, Shen Jing was also involved in the creation of Zaju.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一代崑曲大師，沈在雜劇創作方面也有所染指。

sentences.english: Rich comic factors are reflected in the extant scripts of zaju of the Yuan dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 從元雜劇現存的劇本看，滲透着豐富的喜劇性因素。

sentences.english: Guan Hanqing was born in Dadu. He was the most prominent dramatist of the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 關漢卿，大都人，是元雜劇作家中最傑出的一位。

definition: Tao Zongyi (c. 1329-1410), Yuan dynasty scholar
an excerpt/a digest
Ma Zhiyuan (c. 1250-1321), Yuan dynasty dramatist in the 雜劇|杂剧[za2 ju4] tradition of musical comedy, one of the Four Great Yuan Dramatists 元曲四大家[Yuan2 qu3 Si4 Da4 jia1]
ballad tune in southern dialects, usually to sanxian 三弦 or pipa 琵琶 accompaniment
to comment/a point by point commentary

History of the Early Tang Dynasty, sixteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Liu Xu 劉昫|刘昫[Liu2 Xu4] in 945 during Later Jin 後晉|后晋[Hou4 Jin4] of the Five Dynasties, 200 scrolls
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
letter/also written 書札|书札
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
to check and correct
Wu Cheng'en (1500-1582), author (or compiler) of novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记
Shen Yue (441-513), writer and historian during Liang of Southern dynasties 南朝梁, compiler of History of Song of the Southern dynasties 宋書|宋书
a genre of poetry, developed in the Tang Dynasty, characterized by its strict form
to narrate/narrative
Guan Hanqing (c. 1235-c. 1300), Yuan dynasty dramatist in the 雜劇|杂剧 tradition of musical comedy, one of the Four Great Yuan dramatists 元曲四大家
